active_incidents.title: When switching channels, items that open on the right-hand side including threads, mentions & reactions, and saved items hide immediately.

notes.body:
Some customers may be experiencing issues when switching channels. Items that open on the right-hand side, including threads, mentions & reactions, and saved items, may hide immediately. 


We're actively looking into this, and we'll report back as more information becomes available. We apologize for the disruption.
